tool_description:
Ensure that the individuals and merchants you’re onboarding are not attempting to defraud you by hiding behind a fake IP address or pretending to be from a different location.

With the IP and Location spoofing API, you can now be confident that the users on your platform are not attempting to fake their location or their IP address via a VPN or a proxy.
title: IP and Location Spoofing Detection

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: IP and Location Spoofing Detection
api_list.description:
Ensure that the individuals and merchants you’re onboarding are not attempting to defraud you by hiding behind a fake IP address or pretending to be from a different location.

With the IP and Location spoofing API, you can now be confident that the users on your platform are not attempting to fake their location or their IP address via a VPN or a proxy.

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-and-location-spoofing-detection.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ip_address"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-and-location-spoofing-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
